state.text: Refresh the page and try again. We’re sorry for the inconvenience.
state.title: Something went wrong, please try again.

advice.ethereum: If you don’t have a wallet, we recommend creating a wallet with Metamask.

select-wallet.help: <faq>Need help? Read our guide to learn more</faq>
select-wallet.title: Connect wallet

change-transferability.confirm-sublabel: Once complete your token can be received by anyone.
change-transferability.title: You are about to permanently change who can send & receive your token
change-transferability.warning-text: WARNING: This change cannot be undone!

manage-allowlist-page.add-confirmation-subtext: This address will be able to receive tokens from anyone and send tokens to anyone.
manage-allowlist-page.add-confirmation-text: You are about to add {{address}} to the allowlist.
manage-allowlist-page.description: Wallet addresses that can receive tokens
manage-allowlist-page.remove-confirmation-subtext: This address won't be able to receive tokens from anyone or send tokens to anyone.
manage-allowlist-page.remove-confirmation-text: You are about to remove {{address}} from the allowlist.
manage-allowlist-page.title: Token Allowlist

not-minted-yet-state.title: Transferability will be configurable when token is minted

not-owner-state.text: Connected wallet is {{currentAddress}} but owner is {{ownerAddress}}.
not-owner-state.title: Current wallet does not own the token.

open-token-state.title: The token is fully transferable. Any wallet can receive tokens.

select-owner-wallet.advice: Connect the wallet which owns the token. Address is {{address}}.

token-transferability-section.not-minted-text: Transferability will be configurable when token is minted
token-transferability-section.title: Transferability

wrong-chain-state.text: Wallet should be connected to <chain>{{target}}</chain>. Try change with the button below or via your wallet interface.
wrong-chain-state.title: Wallet not connected to required chain
